code: import search from'./Search.module.css';import loupe from'./../../../../images/loupe.png';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Search=_ref=>{let{formData=[],onSearch}=_ref;const[value,setValue]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();};const handleChange=e=>{const newValue=e.target.value;setValue(newValue);const filteredWords=formData.filter(word=>word.word.toLowerCase().includes(newValue.toLowerCase()));onSearch(filteredWords);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:search.search,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:search.search__form,onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search the word",className:search.search__form_input,value:value,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:loupe,alt:"Loupe",className:search.search__form_img})]})});};export default Search;
